Template

Explosion Adjective Reference

These are specific to Type=explosion templates. 

BLASTTIME
DAMAGE
DAMAGECLASS
DEBRIS
FLASHRGB
FORCE
MAXLIGHT
RANGE
TYPEFLAGS

BLASTTIME Explosion

Delay time from blast to physics blast

Use: blasttime=flex

DAMAGE Explosion

Amount of damage to inflict.

Use: damage=flex

DAMAGECLASS Explosion

Specifies the Type of damage .Damage Flags

Use: damageclass=int.

DEBRIS Explosion

Links a debris template for use with the explosion.

Use: debris=templatename May be used upto 4 times in a template. If the explosion flag "randdebris 0x80" is set

FLASHRGB Explosion

A tint for the explosion

Use: flashrgb=(r/g/b) (vector for red,green,blue)

FORCE Explosion

Amount of force the blast has

Use: force=flex

MAXLIGHT Explosion

Amount of maximum light given off by explosion

Use: maxlight=flex

RANGE Explosion

Specifies the blast radius

Use: range=flex

TYPEFLAGS Explosion

Sets specific typeflags. Explosion Flags

Use: typeflags=int Note a child template can reset the flags of a parent. Ie: the flags are not cumlative.
